title: CVE-2019-10126 (a700s_firmware, active_iq_unified_manager, cn1610_firmware, debian_linux, enterprise_linux, enterprise_linux_aus, enterprise_linux_desktop, enterprise_linux_eus, enterprise_linux_for_real_time, enterprise_linux_for_real_time_for_nfv, enterprise_linux_for_real_time_for_nfv_tus, enterprise_linux_for_real_time_tus, enterprise_linux_server, enterprise_linux_server_aus, enterprise_linux_server_tus, enterprise_linux_workstation, h610s_firmware, hci_management_node, leap, linux_kernel, solidfire, ubuntu_linux, virtualization)
description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. A heap based buffer overflow in mwifiex_uap_parse_tail_ies function in drivers/net/wireless/marvell/mwifiex/ie.c might lead to memory corruption and possibly other consequences.
